name: CreateWorld
description: Creates a new world with the specified dimensions. Worlds are containers for blocks and entities in the Vaste game engine.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The width of the world in blocks

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the world in blocks

returns.description: A world object that can be used with other world functions

example:
-- Create a small world
local smallWorld = CreateWorld(16, 16)

-- Create a large world
local largeWorld = CreateWorld(64, 64)

-- Create a world and fill it with blocks
local gameWorld = CreateWorld(32, 32)
FillBlocksInWorld(gameWorld, vec3(0, 0, 0), vec3(31, 1, 31))
notes: World dimensions should be reasonable to avoid performance issues
Larger worlds require more memory and processing power
The world object is required for most world-related operations
